Detailed Description

DRMPlugin namespace. All DRM plugin code resides in it.

disabled warning 'identifier' : identifier was truncated to 'number' characters in the debug information

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum DRMPlugin::EncMethod
 

Encryption methods.

Enumeration values:
NULLENC  No encryption.
AES128CBC  AES with 128-bit key in CBC mode encryption.
AES128CTR  AES with 128-bit key in CTR mode encryption.
AES128ICM  AES with 128-bit key in ICM mode encryption.
BLOWFISH  Blowfish encryption.

Content info managers indicators.

Enumeration values:
OPENIPMPDOIINFOMANAGER  DOI content info management using openIPMP (OpenIPMPDOIContentInfoManager).
